title: New: ANG LOW – Can’t Describe Her
content: Exploding onto the blog scene three months ago with his debut single Life Goes Down, Brooklyn’s ANG LOW is back with another slice of affecting R&B. Can’t Describe Her is as expertly produced as his debut, but ramping up the pace where it matters, sort of like an ADHD version of The Weeknd. Check out Can’t Describe Her below, and grab a free download from his Bandcamp.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
